bibl.title: Late Roman Berenike.
bibl.note: Eight seasons of fieldwork (1994-2001) by the University of Delaware (USA) and Leiden University (the Netherlands). - Background. - City Planning / Appearance of Buildings. - Commerce. - Demographics. - Religion. - Berenike's Hinterland. - Conclusion. - Pp. 227-229, figg. 11-14: Description of 2 Greek inscriptions and 1 bilingual Greek-Latin inscription.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., Late Roman Berenike.
